::Snitch::

�Nope.� He giggles, still upside-down. �Merchants plural. Highly
inappropriate for singular designation of individual Snitch. Hehehehehee!�
The monkey looks around and lets go of the vine, landing on his feet
perfectly. �Snitch be in space long time. Not get to see planet surface in
over t�erty decacycles.� He sniffs, then lifts up a rock and snatches some
bugs and shoves them into his mouth. �Ooooo! Buggies goood!� He spins around
and holds out a fist full of creepy crawlers. �Want some?�
